Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Ströer, a company in Germany.

160906.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from VNV, an organisation in the Netherlands.
160906.name: Monopoly: Vereniging van Nederlandse Verkeersvliegers VNV

160907.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Hoogvliet, a chain of supermarkets in the Netherlands.
160907.name: Monopoly: Hoogvliet

160908.description:
In Latin, Plus Ultra means «further beyond». It refers to the premise or motto of the reign of Charles I of Spain and V of the Holy Roman Empire. Son of Philip I of Austria and Joanna of Castile, he governed during a good part of the 16th century vast territories which extended across Europe, America and Africa.

Plus Ultra is a board game of quick interaction and medium complexity, for two to four players. During the game, the players represent noblemen from the Spanish Court of the 16th century, who compete to obtain the title of Grandee of Spain (“Grande de España”). To achieve this, they will carry out dangerous endeavours in the name and for the glory of the Crown, with the help of influential personalities from the time’s society: “Almirante de la Mar Océana” (Admiral of the Oceanic Sea), cardinal, viceroy, pirate, conqueror… even the Emperor himself! At the start of each round, a draft of cards will allow the player to choose between two of the available characters. His actions will be resolved following a precise turn order (order of peers) previously established. Put your tactical and planning abilities to the test and become the Emperor’s chosen one!


Plus Ultra significa en latín «ir más allá». Hace referencia a la premisa o lema del reinado de Carlos I de España y V del Sacro Imperio Romano Germánico. Hijo de Felipe de Austria y Juana de Castilla, gobernó durante buena parte del siglo XVI vastos dominios que se extendían sobre Europa, América y África.

Plus Ultra es un juego de mesa de interacción rápida y media complejidad, para dos a cuatro jugadores. Durante el juego los jugadores representan nobles de la Corte española del siglo XVI que rivalizan por conseguir el título de Grande de España. Para lograrlo llevarán a cabo arriesgadas empresas ¡en nombre y para mayor gloria de la Corona! con la ayuda de influyentes personajes de la sociedad de su tiempo: almirante de la mar océana, cardenal, virrey, pirata, conquistador… ¡incluso el mismísimo Emperador! Al comienzo de cada ronda una selección de cartas les permitirá elegir dos de los personajes disponibles. Sus acciones, de carácter múltiple, se resolverán siguiendo un orden de turno preciso (orden de pares) establecido de antemano. ¡Pon a prueba tus habilidades tácticas y de planificación y conviértete en el elegido del Emperador!
160908.name: Plus Ultra: The Court of the Emperor Charles V

160909.name: Mystic Groves
160909.description:
From publisher blurb:

Not all dungeons feature the traditional setup of a monster-filled subterranean network of rooms and passages. Woodland groves, haunted houses, druid groves and more can all serve as an exciting backdrop to the PCs’ adventures. Such locations present their own set of unique design challenges, though, for the time-crunched GM plotting the next adventure.

This instalment of Alternate Dungeons presents loads of great details, hints and tips for a GM designing an adventure set in a druid’s grove or fey-infested forest. Designed to save a GM’s time while adding flavoursome details to bring the locale alive in the player’s minds, Alternate Dungeons: Mystic Groves is an essential tool in any GM’s arsenal. Alternate Dungeons: Mystic Groves presents:

Mystic Groves: An Alternate Dungeon
Mystic Groves: Dressing
Mystic Groves: Denizens
Mystic Groves: Traps & Hazards
Mystic Groves: Adventure Hooks




This product is a Dual Format PDF. The downloadable ZIP file contains two versions, one optimised for printing and use on a normal computer and one optimised for use on a mobile device such as an iPad.

160910.name: Blutlinien
160910.description:
From Introduction:

Die Blutlinien sollen mehr Charakteroptionen für Dungeonslayers bieten. Eine Blutlinie kann dabei durch Abstammung, einen Fluch bzw. Segen oder durch alchemistische Experimente entstehen. Soll ein Charakter einer bestimmten Linie abstammen, muss er das Talent bei der Charaktererschaffung wählen, ansonsten kann er es nur später im Spiel mit Zustimmung des Spielleiters und einem passenden Abenteuer erringen.

Auch wenn die Boni zunächst erstrebenswert erscheinen, so ändert sich das Äußere des Charakters immer weiter, je mehr er sich auf sein Blut besinnt. Das kann ihm ein furchterregendes Aussehen verleihen und den Hass verschiedener Gruppen auf sich ziehen.

Ein Charakter kann nur eine Blutlinie haben.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The bloodlines are designed to provide more character options for Dungeonslayers. A blood line can arise by descent, a curse or blessing or alchemical experiments. If a character of a given line descended, he must choose the talent at character creation, otherwise he can win it only later in the game, with the approval of the lead player and a matching adventure.

Although the bonuses at first seem desirable, then the exterior of the character changes and on, the more he reflects on his blood. This may give him a fearsome appearance and attract the hatred of various groups in coming.

A character can have only one bloodline.

160911.name: Der Kult des Snarrk'Izz
160911.description:
From Introduction:

Tausend klEINE PfOTEN schlEIchen durch die NACHT
Tausend kLEine Augen geben auf euch Acht
Tausend klEine Freunde helfen euch in NoT
BeTET zu Snarrk’Izz dann gehT es euch guT!
– GebeTSVERS dER Snarrk’Izz KultISTEN -


Translation courtesy of Google:

Thousand little paws prowl the NIGHT
Thousand little eyes give you eight
Thousand little friends help you in NoT
Pray to Snarrk'Izz then you are doing well!
- GebeTSVERS oF Snarrk'Izz cultists -

160912.name: Hellwarisches Hexentum
160912.description:
From Introduction:

Der hellwarische „Hexenwahn“ basiert nur teilweise auf der Neigung der Caern zum Schattenfürsten und zur Schwarzmagie (vgl. AvC, S. 41). In der Tat existiert in den tiefen, dunklen Wäldern des Königreichs auch seit Jahrhunderten ein klassisches Hexentum. Die in kleineren Zirkeln bzw. Covenorganisierten Hexen (und weitaus seltener: Hexer) sind nicht viele an der Zahl und leben größtenteils in den verborgensten Winkeln des Dunkeltannim Arltum Aenstein. Es handelt sich meistens um eine erfahrene Hexe, die maximal zwei Schülerinnen bei sich aufnimmt und unterrichtet.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The hellwarische "witch hunts" is based only partly on the slope of the Caern to Shadowlords and Black Magic (cf. AvC, p 41). In fact, exists in the deep, dark forests of the Kingdom and for centuries a classic witchcraft. The in smaller circles or Covenorganisierten witches (and much rarer: sorcerer) are not many in number and mostly live in the most hidden corners of the Dunkeltannim Arltum Aenstein. It is mostly an experienced witch who takes a maximum of two students with him and taught.

160913.name: Einer Flog Über das Greifennest
160913.description:
From Introduction:

Hellweit, in der Erntezeit 1213GF: Im zehnten Jahr der Kronkriege zeichnet sich zwischen den verfeindeten Arltümern Aenstein, Caernos, Nordek und Fahlsteppendlich ein potenzielles Ende der Thronstreitigkeiten ab.

Während der letzten Monate ist viel geschehen, was die hellwarischen Machtverhältnisse recht eindeutig zum Vorteil von Haus Loewester verschoben hat: Da Aenstein und Caernos meist miteinander beschäftigt waren und die ahlstepper sich eher zurückhielten, konnteNordek seine Grenzen nahezu ungehindert mit Wehrtürmen verstärken. Jetzt haben die vier Arls jüngst beschlossen, sich im nächsten Frühling auf der Ebene der Hellen Weiten zu treffen, um – zumindest offiziell! – „friedliche Gespräche über die Zukunft der Krone“ zu führen. Die Löwen sind, wie es scheint, die großen Gewinner der vergangenen Ereignisse, weshalb der Arl von Nordek dem kommenden Jahr zuversichtlich entgegensieht: Er rechnet fest damit, schon bald die Königswürde zurückzuerobern, welche ihm seit dem Tod seines Vaters Danhol(† 1204GF) vorenthalten wurde.

Doch Hellweit wäre nicht das Land der Intrigen und des Verrats, wenn die Konkurrenz diesen Zustand ohne Weiteres hinnehmen würde! Und so braut sich in einem abgelegenen Winkel des Arltums Nordek bereits eine neue Verschwörung gegen die Loewesters zusammen…


Translation courtesy of Google:

Bright wide, at harvest time 1213GF: In the tenth year of Kronkriege a potential end of the throne disputes is emerging between the warring Arltümern Aenstein, Caernos, Nordek and Fahl Quilt Finally.

During the last months a lot has happened, what the hellwarischen power relations has quite clearly moved to the advantage of the house Loewe Rochester: Since Aenstein and Caernos were mostly busy with each other and the ahlstepper rather held back, konnteNordek strengthen its borders virtually unimpeded with defensive towers. Now the four Arls have recently decided to meet next spring at the level of Hellen lengths to - at least not officially! - To conduct "peaceful talks on the future of the Crown". The lions are, it seems, the big winners of the past events, which is why the Arl of Nordek confidently looks forward to the coming year: He fully expects it, soon retake the kingship, denied telling him since his father's death Danhol († 1204GF) been.

But Hell wide would not be the land of intrigue and betrayal when the competition would accept this status without further notice! And so is brewing in a remote corner of the Arltums Nordek already a new conspiracy against the Loewe Marketers together ...

160914.name: Willkommen im Throntal
160914.description:
From Introduction:

Der folgende „Mini-Quellenband“ stellt gewissermaßen den Auftakt zu einem – so Helia will ☺– mehrteiligen HellweitProjekt dar. Angefangen hat das Ganze im Februar 2013 mit einer vagen Abenteueridee unsererseits und wir fanden, dass ein intrigenreiches Setting am besten dazu passen würde. Darum fiel die Schauplatz-Wahl auf eine natürlich begrenzte Ecke im Arltum Nordek, die wir
auf den Namen Throntal tauften.

Ab diesem Zeitpunkt entwickelte unser ursprünglich simpler Ansatz, „irgendetwas daraus zu machen“, relativ schnell eine Art Eigenleben und uferte nach und nach immer weiter aus. Neben der Caera-Box erwies sich das Slayerforum als grandiose Inspirationsquelle – allen voran natürlich der virtuelle Ableger der Hellweiter Kronkriege (Arltum-2-Vote), aber auch Christian Kennigs Kampagne zum „Waldmark-Konflikt“. Mit der Zeit gelangten wir zu der Einsicht, dass „unser Baby“ erstmal ein bisschen fluffiges Drumherum vertragen könnte und das Ergebnis hast Du nun vor Augen…

Willkommen im Throntal ist in erster Linie als Einführung, Nachschlagewerk und Spielhilfe für SL gedacht, die sich an einzelnen Abenteuern oder gar einer Kampagne in einem hellwarischen Sandbox-Setting ausprobieren möchten. Bei Aufbau und Inhalt haben wir uns einerseits möglichst eng an der offiziellen Spielhilfe Crimlak und das Dreiental von Christian Kennig & Moritz Mehlem zu orientieren versucht. Ganz nebenbei wollten wir damit auch den Hut vor der (in unseren Augen) „Mutter aller Regionalbände“ ziehen und ein bisschen in Erinnerungen an die gute alte Zeit mit Volo’s Guides to the Realms schwelgen.

Mit den spielbereiten Charakteren (SC-2-Go) haben wir ein kleines Goodie für die Spieler-Fraktion eingebaut. Der Hintergedanke dabei war, dass sich Hellweit eher weniger als Tummelplatz für eine typische Abenteurergruppe eignet: Welcher Bael würde schon einer aus allen Ecken Caeras dahergelaufenen Bande von Mietklingen vertrauen, wenn der eigene Nachbar dafür bekannt ist, alles und jeden zu bestechen? Als Helden taugen daher solche SC besser, deren Hintergrund sie von vornherein in die Nähe der Handlung rückt. Die Beispielcharaktere sind aber auch der Beweis dafür, dass man sich deswegen nicht unbedingt auf einheimische Nordeker beschränken muss. Und falls man sie nicht spielen möchte, kann der SL sie ja problemlos recyclen – zum Beispiel als NSC-Begleiter für seine Spieler.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The following "mini-sourcebook" In a way, the beginning of a - so Helia wants ☺ - multipart Hell wide project dar. It started the whole thing in February 2013 with a vague adventure idea on our part and we found that an intrigue-rich setting would best suit them. That is why the choice fell on a scene of course limited in the corner Arltum Nordek that we
baptized in the name Throntal.

From this point, our originally simple approach, "anything to do with it" developed relatively quickly a life of its own and overflowed gradually further and further. In addition to the Caera box, the Slayer forum proved to be terrific source of inspiration - all, of course, the virtual offshoot of Hell Next Kronkriege (Arltum-2-Vote), but also Christian Kennigs campaign on the "forest marrow conflict." By the time we came to the realization that "our baby" first could do with a bit fluffy trappings and the result you now have in mind ...

Welcome to the Throntal is primarily intended as an introduction, reference and Game Help for SL who want to try it out on individual adventures or even a campaign in a hellwarischen sandbox setting. In structure and content we have on the one hand trying to orient ourselves to the official Game Help Crimlak and Dreiental of Christian Kennig & Moritz Mehlem as closely as possible. Along the way we wanted hence the hat before (in our eyes) pull "mother of all regional volumes" and indulge a little reminiscing about the good old days with Volo's Guide to the Realms.

With the ready to play characters (SC-2-Go), we have built a small goodie for the player faction. The thinking behind this was that Hell wide rather less than a playground for a typical group of adventurers is: Which Bael would ever trust a running up from all corners Caeras gang of Mietklingen when one's neighbor is known to bribe everyone and everything? As a hero, therefore, such SC suck better background, they engaged from the outset in the vicinity of the plot. However, the example characters are also proof that one need not necessarily be limited to domestic Nordeker be so. And if you do not want to play, the SL can be recycled so easily - for example, as NPC's companions for his players.

160915.name: Aus Grauer Vorzeit
160915.description:
From Introduction:

Aus grauer Vorzeit ist eine Erweiterung für DS-X , aber genauso geeignet für Dungeonslayers, Gammaslayers und besonders Caveslayers.

Alle hier vorgestellen Monster sind historisch, so dass sich Spieler und Spielleitung einfach über den lateinischen Namen und das Internet nähere Informationen suchen können.

Settingideen bietet unter anderem bekannte Literatur und Filme:

Urzeitwesen werden genetisch nachgezüchet und geraten ausser Kontrolle (Jurassic Park)
Wesen kommen durch ein Zeitloch in ein andere Zeit (BBC Primeval)
Tiere haben in agelegenden Gegenden überlebt (Sir Conan A. Doyle: Die Vergessene Welt)
In einer fremden Hohlwelt oder Dimension existieren die Wesen immernoch (Jules Verne: Reise zum Mittelpunkt der Erde)
und viele mehr…





Translation courtesy of Google:

From the mists of time is an extension of DS-X, but equally suitable for Dungeonslayers, gamma layer and especially Caveslayers.

All the monsters are historically present here, so that player and game management easy to find more information on the Latin name and the Internet.

Setting Ideas offers, among other well-known literature and films:

Primal beings are genetically nachgezüchet and get out of control (Jurassic Park)
Beings coming through a hole in time in a different time (BBC Primeval)
Pets have agelegenden areas survived (Sir Conan A. Doyle: The Lost World)
In a strange hollow world or dimension beings still exist (Jules Verne: Journey to the Center of the Earth)

160916.name: Das Geheimnis der Goblinburg
160916.description:
From Introduction:

Völlig überraschend kam eine Gruppe von Goblins, die von einigen Hobgoblins angeführt werden, aus dem Nichts und besetzte die kleine Festung des örtlichen Dorfes. Von dem Herrscher fehlt seitdem jegliche Spur. Nun werden Helden gesucht, die die Eindringlinge vertreiben.Völlig überraschend kam eine Gruppe von Goblins, die von einigen Hobgoblins angeführt werden, aus dem Nichts und besetzte die kleine Festung des örtlichen Dorfes. Von dem Herrscher fehlt seitdem jegliche Spur. Nun werden Helden gesucht, die die Eindringlinge vertreiben.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Quite surprisingly, a group of goblins that are led by some Hobgoblins, out of nowhere and occupied the small fortress of the local village. From the ruler since missing any trace. Now heroes are sought that the invaders vertreiben.Völlig surprisingly, a group of goblins that are led by some Hobgoblins, out of nowhere and occupied the small fortress of the local village. From the ruler since missing any trace. Now heroes are searched selling the invaders.

160917.name: Das Grabmal der Dunklen Fürsten
160917.description:
From Introduction:

Vor 1000 Jahren begannen drei gormanische Fürsten der Dämonenfürstin Lilva Menschenopfer darzubringen. Als Gegenleistung versprach diese ihnen ewiges Leben und unermessliche Schätze. In einem geheimen unterirdischen Gewölbe vollbrachten sie ihre unheimlichen Taten. Die Dämonin hatte ihnen allerdings nicht gesagt, dass mit ewigem Leben ein Dasein als Untote gemeint war und dass die Schätze verflucht waren. Als Lilva von den Lords gelangweilt war, versah sie das Gewölbe mit einigen Fallen und überließ die drei Todgeweihten ihrem Schicksal...

Vor einiGen Wochen entdeckten die Goblins Trenk, Lusch und Plit den Eingang zum Gewölbe, der nach einem heftigen Unwetter freigespült wurde. Sie beschlossen, diese Räumlichkeiten als neue Basis für ihre Raubzüge zu nutzen. Die SC werden bei einem Nachtlager heimlich von den Goblins überfallen, und ein wichtiger Gegenstand wird ihnen geraubt. Die Spuren führen zu einem düsteren Ort: dem Grabmal der dunklen Fürsten...


Translation courtesy of Google:

1000 years ago, three gormanische princes of the demon lord began Lilva offer up human sacrifices. In return promised them eternal life and this immense treasures. In a secret underground vault they accomplished their sinister deeds. The demon, however, had not told them that with eternal life an existence was meant as undead, and that the treasures were cursed. As Lilva was bored by the Lords, she knew the vault with some traps and left the three doomed to their fate ...

A few weeks ago the goblins Trenk, Lusch and Plit discovered the entrance to the vault, which was flushed after a violent storm. They decided to use this space as a new base for their raids. The SC are attacked secretly by the goblins at a camp for the night, and an important object is stolen from them. The tracks lead to a gloomy place: the Tomb of the Dark Lord ...

160918.name: Das Grabmal des Cheofir
160918.description:
From Introduction:

Hintergrund
Als Daiwaristan vor über 800 Jahren errichtet wurde gehörte der Elementar-Zauberer Cheofir zu den Gründervätern und den Zeugen des Paktes mit den Elementen. Er lehrte über 60 Jahre an der Schule der Elementarmagie und war ein gern gesehener Gast im Dschinnentempel. Als er starb wurde er in der Nekropole außerhalb der Stadt beigesetzt. Der Zauber-Schüler Kaissan ben Halef erfuhr von dem lange vergessenen Grab in der Nekropole und stellte wissbegierig Nachforschungen an. Er gelangte in das Grab und fand das „Elixier der Elemente“. Als er es kostete, wurde er zu einem Feuerdschinn und verlor sein Gedächtnis. Die Elementarlehrerin Ioanastra fand die Schriftrollen von Cheofir, die Karte zum Grabmal in Kaissans Quartier und entdeckte, dass das Amulett des Schulgründers gestohlen wurde. Sie sorgt sich um ihren Schüler und bittet die SCs in das Grab zu gehen und nach ihm zu suchen.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Background
As Daiwaristan was built over 800 years ago was one of the elemental wizard Cheofir of the founding fathers and the witness of the pact with the elements. He taught over 60 years at the school of elemental magic and was a welcome guest in Dschinnentempel. When he died he was buried in the necropolis outside the city. The magic student Kaissan ben Halef learned of the long-forgotten grave in the necropolis and found curious inquiries to. He reached into the grave and found the "Elixir of elements." When he tasted it, he became a Feuerdschinn and lost his memory. The elementary teacher Ioanastra found the scrolls of Cheofir that map to the tomb in Kaissans quarters and discovered that the amulet of the school's founders, was stolen. She cares about her students and asks the PCs to go into the grave and look for him.

160919.description: Crisis Averted After listening to the community of BGG we have decided to make the game free to print and play. We have taken the time to ensure the game is a fun experience for all ages and enjoy a healthy debate on your favorite comic book icons. Welcome to Crisis Averted! Players will be dealt cards representing different iconic characters from popular culture, using knowledge of these characters they will avert the crisis set before them. Crisis Averted can be best described as a role-playing multiplayer party card game; where creativity is pivotal to winning. Crisis Averted fuses traditional role-playing storytelling elements with a competitive party game format. The game uses a Judge System, one player per round is the Construct, from their hand of five Crisis Cards they must devise of scenario to the other players.
160919.name: Crisis Averted

160920.description:
What’s better than getting yourself as a survivor? How about a pet! This deck includes many of the animal submissions from the backers from our first Kickstarter and a few of our own devising. Some of them are walking time bombs, and others are just plain adorable. Either way having a fifth member of your Squad can come in handy when holding back a zombie horde. Whether it’s man’s best friend or a polar bear, you never know what they will bring to the Squad dynamic. This deck also includes new special abilities.

Each deck comes with 25 Survivors and 2 Blank cards for you to create your own.
160920.name: Zpocalypse: Animal Survivor Card Pack

160921.description: Totalbiscuit A.K.A the Cynical Brit, is a refined English gentleman of acerbic wit and regal authority. His commentary on video games was watched by millions, but with the collapse of civilization, Biscuit sought a new vocation. He can only assume that slaughtering zombies will prove less frustrating than some of the video games he’s played.
160921.name: Zpocalypse: Aftermath – Totalbisquit

160922.name: Gli occhi del serpente
160922.description:
From the publisher's blurb (translated):

In this module you’ll find everything you need for running an investigation in the Sanctum Imperium, consisting in four chapters and twelve scenarios, to prevent the occurrence of an evil rite.

160923.name: Die Hallen der Reinigung
160923.description:
From Introduction:

Die Lorr-Priesterschaft von Gardburg hat ein Problem: Der alte Friedhof soll samt Hallen der Reinigung restauriert werden, jedoch hat sich irgendetwas dort eingenistet. Keiner der Priester, die zur Beseitigung des Übels ausgesandt wurden, ist bisher zurückgekehrt. Daher werden die Helden angeheuert das Ganze zu untersuchen. Die Hallen der Reinigung liegen ein gutes Wegstück von Gardburg entfernt an den Ausläufern des Kronengrats.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The Lorr priesthood of Gardburg has a problem: The old cemetery is to be restored, including halls of cleaning, but anything has taken root there. None of the priests who were sent to eliminate the evil is so far back. Therefore, the heroes are hired to investigate the whole thing. Halls of cleaning are a good stretch of Gardburg away at the foothills of Kronengrats.

160924.description: Mild-mannered comic book reviewer Linkara has always found himself in world-threatening crises. Armed with an indomitable will, quick wits, a star ship, and an arsenal of hi-tech and magical weapons, he triumphed. But not even Linkara could stop the coming of the Zpocalypse.
160924.name: Zpocalypse: Aftermath – Linkara

160925.name: Anglia
160925.description:
From the blurb (translated):

This sourcebook covers the British isles in the aftermath of the Awakening.

160926.description: Fancy man about town Jim Sterling was once the celebrated reviews editor of Destructoid.com, as well as a consumer advocate on the Jimquisition. A man of controversial opinion, Jim was no stranger to being attacked by mindless hordes, even before the zombie outbreak occurred. With an imposing frame that belies his uncanny agility, Jim joins up with Angry Joe to get the undead sorted out once and for all.
160926.name: Zpocalypse: Aftermath – Jim Sterling

160927.description:
Thanks to the amazing backers from our first Kickstarter, we were given an army of downtrodden, desperate Survivors to add to the Zpocalypse struggle. We selected a number of them to make Survivor Packs, which include new special abilities and a host of people who think they’re ready to face the onslaught.

Each deck comes with 25 Survivors and 2 Blank cards for you to create your own.
160927.name: Zpocalypse: Survivor Card Pack #1

160928.name: Ars Arcani
160928.description:
From the blurb (translated):

Usually humans have no psychic power of their own but occasionally an individual may develop such a gift: this sourcebook covers such phenomena.

160929.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Harrods, London (U.K.).
160929.name: Monopoly: Harrods Edition

160930.description: Before the Zpocalypse “Angry” Joe Vargas was a video game critic with a global military organization dedicated to protecting consumers from corporate greed. When even his mighty forces fell before the zombie hordes, Joe put out the call to his most powerful allies determined to form a Squad of the finest post-Zpocalyptic Warriors in the world! Now without his beloved video games and filled with rage, Joe has only one purpose. Kill them all!
160930.name: Zpocalypse: Aftermath – Angry Joe

160931.description: When internet film and game critic Spoony succumbs to madness, he becomes a creature of chaos and science: Doctor Insano! Approached by his arch-enemies, Angry Joe and Linkara, the mad scientist agrees to help fight the zombie threat – if only so he can destroy the world himself!
160931.name: Zpocalypse: Aftermath – Dr. Insano

160932.name: Die Kinder der Schatten
160932.description:
From Introduction:

Die Kinder der Schatten ist das Auftakt-Abenteuer zur Kampagne „Purpurträume“. Dieses Abenteuer kann aber auch unabhängig von der Kampagne gespielt werden. Der D2go ist im Wyndland in einer Stadt namens Rokanokangesiedelt, doch er kann natürlich in jeder größeren Stadt überall in Caera spielen. Eine nähere Beschreibung des Landes und der Stadt findet sich im Fanwerk-Regionalband Wyndland: Der Ruf der Wölfe.Am Ende des Abenteuers finden die SC 6 purpurne Tränke und einen Schuldschein, lasse diese Beute einfach weg, wenn dieser D2go als einzelnes Abenteuer gespielt werden soll. Optional könnten dann auch alle vermissten Kinder gefunden werden.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The Children of the Shadow is the prelude adventure to the campaign "Purple Dreams". However, this adventure can also independently of the campaign be played. The D2go is Wyndland in a town called Rokanokangesiedelt, but of course it can play in every major city throughout Caera. A more detailed description of the country and the city can be found in Fanwerk Regional band Wyndland - Call of the Wölfe.Am find the end of the adventure SC 6 purple potions and a promissory note, this loot just leave it off when this D2go to be played as a single adventure. Optional all missing children could then be found.

160933.description:
Add military base themed tiles and cards to your Zpocalypse Core game!

Product contents

8 Military themed tiles (Front = Military base top side(fences, tents, guard towers /Back = Underground bunker tiles)
5 Promo weapon cards (Lazer Sabre, Mini nuke, Lincoln's top hat, Lawn mower, ZBFG)
5 Something’s Happening cards (New, useable with any Zpoc product)

Something’s Happening Promo Cards
A puppy
Raiders in the night
Cannibals
Stickies
The tunnels have ears

Armory Promo Cards
Lasersaber
ZBFG
Mini Nuke
Lincoln’s Top Hat
Lawnmower
160933.name: Zpocalypse: Military Tiles and Promotional Cards

160934.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Diagned, a pharmaceutical distribution division in the Netherlands.
160934.name: Robopoly: Het beroemde gezelschapsspel

160935.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Gold Coast, a city in Queensland, Australia.
160935.name: Monopoly: Gold Coast Australia

160937.name: Lockruf aus der Finsternis
160937.description:
From Introduction:

Gorm Bockshuber ist verärgert. Die Baustelle seiner lange geplanten Kellererweiterung von Warenlager D ruht nun schon seit Tagen. Die zuständigen Arbeiter sind spurlos verschwunden, der Suchtrupp der Garde, der ihr Verschwinden aufklären sollte, ebenfalls. Gerüchte machen sich breit, dass die Baustelle verflucht sei, dass die Vestracher zu gierig in ihrem Bestreben waren, die Stadt zu einer florierenden Handelsmacht aufsteigen zu lassen, dass die Götter dem Einhalt gebieten wollen, und ähnlicher Unsinn. Für Bockshuber, hohes Mitglied des Vestracher Handelsrates, ein untragbarer - weil kostspieliger - Zustand. Doch glücklicherweise sind seine Boten bereits auf dem Weg, schlagkräftige Abenteurer ausfindig zu machen, die dem Spuk für die stattliche Belohnung von 500 GM ein Ende bereiten sollen...


Translation courtesy of Google:

Gorm Huber Bock is upset. The site of his long-planned extension of the basement warehouse D now rests for days. The competent workers have disappeared, the search party of the Guards, which should enlighten her disappearance, also. Rumors are spreading that the site is cursed, that the Vestracher were too greedy in their quest to move up the city into a flourishing trading power that the gods want to put a stop to, and similar nonsense. For Huber Bock, senior member of the Vestracher Trade Council, an intolerable - because costly - state. But fortunately, his messengers already on the way to make powerful adventurers find that will put an end to the nightmare for the handsome reward of 500 GM ...

160938.name: Ein Halbes Dutzend Minidungeons
160938.description:
From Introduction:

Eine Sammlung von kleinen Dungeons für Zwischendurch.


Translation courtesy of Google:

A collection of small dungeons in between.

160939.name: Die Pyramide des Eck'Wan
160939.description:
From Introduction:

Eck´Wan liegt halb versunken und vergessen im Wüstensand von Shan Zasar. Einst zierte Gold die Spitze der Pyramiden und zeugte von dem großen Reichtum des damaligen Herrschers.

Vor langer, langer Zeit benötigte Eck ´Wan die Seelen und ein bestimmtes Organ, welches nur Halblinge besitzen, um sich unsterblich zu machen und zu einem UntotenLeichnam zu werden. Er ließ damals hunderte von Halblingen opfern und die Leichen wurden unter dem Ritualraum verscharrt. Eck´Wan ist schon lange nicht mehr und seine Pyramide ist fast vollständig im Wüstensand versunken. Doch sein unheiliges Ritual lebt weiter und erschafft weiterhin untote Halblinge. Diese streunen ziellos durch die Gegend auf der Suche nach Erlösung. Die Bewohner eines nahe gelegenen Dorfes ersuchen die SC um Hilfe. Sie können den Helden zwar nicht viel bieten (100 GM),doch locken in der Pyramide die Schätze einer längst vergessenen Welt.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Eck'Wan lies half-submerged and forgotten in the desert sands of Shan Zasar. Gold once graced the top of the pyramids, and fathered by the great wealth of the then ruler.

A long, long time ago Eck 'Wan needed the souls and a particular organ, which have only halflings, to make himself immortal, and to become a UntotenLeichnam. He was then sacrifice hundreds of halflings and the bodies were buried under the ritual space. Eck'Wan is long gone and his pyramid is almost completely buried in the desert sand. But his unholy ritual lives on and continues to create undead halflings. These roam around aimlessly in search of redemption. The residents of a nearby village asking the SC to help. You can the hero not offer much (100 GM), but lure in the pyramid the treasures of a forgotten world.

160940.name: Schatten unter Westheim
160940.description:
From Introduction:

Im Jahr 534 wird der Zaubermeister Nagrathul, der seine dunklen Horden von Orks und Untoten auf einen Verwüstungsfeldzug ins Dreiental führte, vernichtet. Doch auch heute, knapp 500 Jahre später, gibt es noch verwirrte Seelen, die die Ansichten und Werte Nagrathuls teilen, und in seinem Sinne neue Pläne schmieden, die Tod und Leid über die Freien Lande bringen sollen. So lebt im Schatten der Stadt Westheim ein alter Mann, der im sozialen Leben auf den Namen Marcus Feldmann hört und einer der angesehensten Architekten der Stadt ist. Er selbst nennt sich Almarm der Düstere und betreibt in einem Keller unter seinem Anwesen bizarre Experimente an Tieren und Menschen, einzig dem Ziel dienend eine Untote Armee aufstellen zu können, die die Freien Lande in Dunkelheit stürzen soll.

Die Helden sollten sich in der Westheimer Taverne „Des Glückes Schmied“ oder in näherer Umgebung zur Taverne befinden. Der Wirt Harald Wunderlich wird im Verlauf des Abends Wein- oder Bierfässer aus seinem Keller holen müssen. Eine halbe Minute nachdem Wunderlich hinter der Kellertür verschwunden ist, hört man aus dem Keller eine Explosion. Sollten sich die Helden dazu entschließen die Kellertür zu öffnen, wird sich ihnen Staub und Dreck auf die Lungen legen, der durch die Explosion aufgewirbelt wurde.


Translation courtesy of Google:

In the year 534, the master magician Nagrathul that led to the devastation Dreiental on a campaign in the dark hordes of orcs and undead destroyed. Yet even today, almost 500 years later, there are still confused souls who share the views and values ​​Nagrathuls, and new plans in his mind, to bring death and suffering to the outdoor country. So living in the shadow of City West home an old man listening in social life in the name of Marcus Feldmann and is one of the most respected architects in the city. He calls himself Almarm the Dark and operates in a cellar underneath his estate bizarre experiments on animals and humans, the sole aim of serving an undead army to set up, which is to overthrow the outdoor landing in darkness.

The heroes should be located in the Westheimer tavern "The fortune" or nearby the tavern. The host Harald Wunderlich will need to bring in the rest of the evening wine or beer barrels from his basement. Half a minute after Wunderlich has disappeared behind the cellar door, you can hear from the basement explosion. Should the heroes decide to open the cellar door, will put them dirt and dust on the lungs, which was stirred up by the explosion.

160941.name: Stinger Class Fighter
160941.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is a little booklet of a Traveller compatible starship. The ship introduced in this installment of the series is a heavy 90dT Fighter.

The PDF contains the background of the ship, statistics for it and its crew. In addition the document contains simple deckplans (Without scale or grid!) of the ship and images showing the ship from various directions.

160942.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Zappos, a company in the US. Benefit is granted to the Nevada Childhood Cancer Foundation.
160942.name: Monopoly: Zappos

160943.description:
This promo card was released at Origins 2014.

Text:





Prince (Action - Cost 8)



You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to 4. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it).




Part of the Dominion series.
160943.name: Dominion: Prince Promo Card

160944.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Dr. Ochel, a real estate company.
160944.name: Monopoly: Dr. Ochel Immoplus N.V.

160945.name: Adventures in the East Mark: Basic Rule Set

rpg.10154: Aventuras en la Marca del Este

160945.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Spanish game "Aventuras en La Marca del Este" began from the mind of Pedro Gil as a homebrew campaign for some friends in Spain playing the world's most famous game as devised in Frank Mentzer’s (BECMI) Red Box with 9 starter classes and new rules on mounted combat, aerial combat, seafaring and ship battles. Now, many years later, it is one of the most popular role-playing games in Spain. By enlisting incredible artists that are now rising stars in the RPG industry such as A.J. Manzanedo, Jorge Carrero and Víctor Guerra, the "La Marca" team produced an incredibly captivating "retroclone" role-playing game that is an old school experience wrapped in old world flare. The game is published in Spain by Holocubierta Ediciones.

Supported by Kickstarter, this is the first ever English edition of the game, now called "Adventures in the East Mark". This Basic Rule Set has everything that you need to play a game with the deep traditions of the original fantasy roleplaying game and imbibe it with an authentic European flavor.

160946.name: Adventures in the East Mark: Quick Start Rules

rpg.10154: Aventuras en la Marca del Este

160946.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Spanish game "Aventuras en La Marca del Este" began from the mind of Pedro Gil as a homebrew campaign for some friends in Spain playing the world's most famous game as devised in Frank Mentzer’s (BECMI) Red Box with 9 starter classes and new rules on mounted combat, aerial combat, seafaring and ship battles. Now, many years later, it is one of the most popular role-playing games in Spain. By enlisting incredible artists that are now rising stars in the RPG industry such as A.J. Manzanedo, Jorge Carrero and Víctor Guerra, the "La Marca" team produced an incredibly captivating "retroclone" role-playing game that is an old school experience wrapped in old world flare. The game is published in Spain by Holocubierta Ediciones.

Supported by Kickstarter, this is the first ever English edition of the game, now called "Adventures in the East Mark". The Quick Start Rules presented here gives you what you need to get a taste of what the East Mark offers.

160947.name: Adventures in the East Mark: Narrator Screen

rpg.10154: Aventuras en la Marca del Este

160947.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Spanish game "Aventuras en La Marca del Este" began from the mind of Pedro Gil as a homebrew campaign for some friends in Spain playing the world's most famous game as devised in Frank Mentzer’s (BECMI) Red Box with 9 starter classes and new rules on mounted combat, aerial combat, seafaring and ship battles. Now, many years later, it is one of the most popular role-playing games in Spain. By enlisting incredible artists that are now rising stars in the RPG industry such as A.J. Manzanedo, Jorge Carrero and Víctor Guerra, the "La Marca" team produced an incredibly captivating "retroclone" role-playing game that is an old school experience wrapped in old world flare. The game is published in Spain by Holocubierta Ediciones.

This Narrator Screen contains all of the most important tables, including ones on the outside for players. This digital version has been split into six landscape pages, able to be used with such variable screens like Hammerdog's "The World's Greatest Screen".

160948.name: Der Tempel des Krokodilgottes
160948.description:
From Introduction:

Die Echsenmenschen der Schlangeninsel verehren ein riesiges, 20m langes Salzwasserkrokodil als Gott und haben über seiner Höhle eine Stufenpyramide gebaut, von der aus sie ihrem hungrigen Gott Menschenopfer darbringen. Der Höhleneingang führt direkt ins Meer, die Pyramide ist allerdings über einen Pfad durch den Dschungel erreichbar.

Die Helden erfahren, dass der Spion eines Elfenfürsten, der seit Jahren im Krieg mit einem mächtigen Nekromanten liegt, ein Buch von hohem rituellen Wert aus der Dschungel-Kolonie eben dieses Schwarzmagiers gestohlen hat. Alrim Wellenläufer, der Elfenspion, ist allerdings nicht zu seinen Herren zurückgekehrt und Nachforschungen haben ergeben, dass er von Echsenmenschen im Dschungel überfallen und entführt wurde. Sowohl die Elfen als auch der Nekromant würden gutes Geld dafür zahlen (d.h. 100 Goldstücke) den Spion in ihre Hände zu bekommen.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The Lizards Snake Island worship a huge, 20m long salt water crocodile as a god and have built over his cave a step pyramid, from which they offer their hungry god of human sacrifice. The entrance leads directly into the sea, the pyramid, however, is accessible via a path through the jungle.

The heroes learn that the spy an elf prince, who has for years been at war with a powerful necromancer, a book of high ritual value from the jungle colony just this black magician has stolen. Alrim wave runners, the elf spy is, however, not returned to his master and investigations have revealed that he was attacked and kidnapped by lizard people in the jungle. Both the elves and the Necromancer would pay good money for it (ie 100 gold pieces) to get the spy in their hands.

160949.name: Hexploration-2-Go
160949.description:
From Introduction:

Mit Hexploration-2-Go und einem W20 kannst du eine eine komplette, spielbare Welt für mutige Slayer erwürfeln. Los geht’s!

Hex, Hex!
Hexfelder werden als Einheiten zur Unterteilung benutzt, weil sie auch bei diagonaler Bewegung immer den gleichen Abstand zueinander haben. Die ideale Größe zwischen zwei Seiten sind 9 km, weil sich keine krummen Teilungen ergeben und das Hex verwaltbar bleibt. Auf Meereshöhe beträgt die Sichtweite zum Horizont max. 5 km. Wenn Slayer ein Hex betreten, können sie nicht in angrenzende Hexfelder schauen bis sie min. zur Mitte vordringen oder einen Aussichtspunkt finden. Pro 100 m Höhe wird ein weiterer Ring um das aktuelle Hex einsehbar (nur Geländeart).


Translation courtesy of GOogle:

With Hexploration-2-Go and a W20 you can get a complete, playable world erwürfeln for bold Slayer. Let's go!

Hex, Hex!
Hexes are used as units to divide, because they always have each other the same distance even with a diagonal movement. The ideal size is between two sides are 9 km, because there are no crooked divisions and the hex remains manageable. At sea level, is the sight of the horizon max. 5 km. If Slayer enter a hex, they can not look into adjacent hexes until min. penetrate to the center or find a vantage point. Another ring around the current hex is per 100 m altitude with privacy (only terrain).

160950.description:
The Badger Deck is an expanded deck of playing cards suitable for prototyping new games or for playing a whole range of already available (but possibly out of print) games.

The basic deck consists of the standard set of suits (hearts, clubs, diamonds and spades) with an additional six suits: pyramids, moons, stars, flowers, coins, bats. All suits have the ranks Ace (A), numbers 0-10, the traditional ranks Jack (J), Queen (Q), King (K) as well as additional ranks Fool (F), Wizard (W), Sorceress (S), Hero (H), Princess (P), Castle (C), Mythical creature/Monster (M).
160950.name: The Badger Deck

160951.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from The Rotterdam Eye Hospital, based in Rotterdam, The Netherlands.
160951.name: Monopoly: oog – het oogziekenhuis Rotterdam

160952.name: George's Children
160952.description:
From publisher blurb:

George’s Children is a roleplaying story game set in a hypothetical near-future post-apocalyptic world devoid of adults. The fate of humankind can be defined during play; or not at all... but the cause of man’s destruction has little to no impact on the game. Taking on the roles of children, the players tell the story of a single day in the children’s lives. Each story provides players with an opportunity to narrate their own accomplishments and dictate the tone of their adventures. The story environment is rich with potential, the game can be played with zero prep-time, and there is no need for a gamemaster.

160953.name: GMZero Introduction Document
160953.description:
From publisher blurb:

GMZero is a series of GMless games, with fully realized rule system and intricate storylines. Each game is differnet, but shares a common goal. This document is a helpful tool for people unfamiliar with how to play a GMless game.

And it's free.

It's also useful for players of the Protocol Game series.

160954.name: Enemy Front
160954.description:
STORY
You’re Robert Hawkins, an American stuck deep in Nazi controlled territory during the height of WWII. It’s up to you whether to fight your enemies face to face, snipe them from afar, or sneak past and sabotage their positions. Join the fight against the evil Third Reich in open-ended missions across war torn Europe.

FEATURES
PLAY YOUR WAY
Use stealth as your ally or rush in guns blazing.

DEATH FROM AFAR
Pick off distant enemies with the precision of your sniper rifle.

BEAUTIFUL BATTLEFIELDS
Experience gorgeous environments, all powered by CryENGINE®3 technology.

TAKE THE FIGHT ONLINE
Declare war on up to 11 of your friends in online multiplayer.

Source: The Game Website.



ENEMY FRONT is the first truly modern WW2 FPS, featuring stunning visuals and a richly interactive combat sandbox gameplay experience.

ENEMY FRONT breaks out of the standard model of highly linear scripted FPS experience, giving the player full freedom to own their playing style. Run & Gun, Stealth, Subterfuge - all are viable approaches for the player, maximizing player engagement and replayability.

Against the visceral backdrop of breathtaking European locales, the player takes on the role of American war correspondent Robert Hawkins, as he fights -and covers -iconic missions from anti-Nazi Resistance operations in France, Nazi Germany, Norway, and Warsaw throughout WW2.

KEY FEATURES


Breathtaking visuals, highly dynamic environments, and spectacular blockbuster action across many iconic Resistance operations of WW2.
Deep Resistance Fighter gameplay blends fast-paced FPS action with thrilling stealth, sniping, and clandestine operations in the first true sandbox WW2 game.
Full arsenal of WW2 weaponry across all categories of hand-guns, SMGs, and rifles, as well as signature Resistance weapons including the Sten gun, Welrod Silenced Pistol, and Lightning SMG.
Highly destructible environments and advanced sandbox AI mean combat is always a rewarding and dynamic experience.
Introducing franchise protagonist Roy Hawkins, American war correspondent turned hero of the Resistance, and a memorable cast of Resistance leaders in France, Norway, and Warsaw.
10-12 hour Campaign and Multiplayer, all powered by CRYENGINE® technology.


Source: The Publisher Website.

160955.name: Dying Memoryes
160955.description:
From publisher blurb:

In Dying Memoryes, players take on the roles of crewmembers trapped in cryogenic sleep aboard a ship in deep space. The spaceship has gone adrift, heading into the orbit of a wayward planet (or a star… or a nebula). As the ship’s unavoidable and tragic decent to the inhospitable world continues, the crewmembers’ minds struggle to awaken them, causing them to suffer traumatic episodes of fragmented memories from their past, in an attempt to reestablish their lives. Their final moments spent trying to formulate who they were and what is happening.

160956.name: Forget-Me-Not
160956.description:
From publisher blurb:

Forget-Me-Not (FMN) is a progressive roleplaying game experience that plays in about three hours, though longer games are an option. It can be played with or without a gamemaster, but requires at least three players.

Set in the fictional town of Northern Falls, FMN allows players to take on the roles of various key figures in town — the Sheriff, the Town Drunk, the Heiress, the Reporter, etc. — but no one controls any of the characters. Each scene is played differently from the last. In each scene, players take on alternate roles and focus on varying aspects of the town, while exploring the confusing and weird behaviors of the people unaffected by Jessica Ashwick’s death.

160957.name: Tunnels & Trolls 1st Edition Reprint
160957.description:
From publisher blurb:

During our successful "Deluxe Tunnels & Trolls" kickstarter, as a stretch goal we offered a reprint of the original T&T rules from 1975 if someone would purchase Ken's last original copy for a ridiculous sum of money. Someone did. So here it is. This is the complete, original rule set, and is sufficient to play any of the solitaire adventures of today.

160958.description:
Can Batman take down The Joker — or will he go mad trying? The action is fast and furious in DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Rivals – Batman vs The Joker as players vie to add the right mix of components to their decks, then launch attacks directly at their archnemesis! This set, which is compatible with any title in the DC Comics Deck-Building Game series, introduces confrontation rules that allow you to attack an opposing character and block cards that ward off confrontations.

The first player to drop the opponent three times wins, although each time an opponent gets dropped, he'll rise up even stronger than before; in game terms, each player has three oversized character cards, and if you're defeated, you reveal the next card with a booosted-up ability. Alternatively, if the main deck runs out of cards, the player with the most VPs wins.
160958.name: DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Rivals – Batman vs The Joker

160960.description:
The year is 1947. The war that started a decade ago has now spread worldwide. The discovery of a crashed alien spacecraft in the Antarctic has led to the development of revolutionary combat walkers that surpass the most advanced tank technology. Old alliances have fragmented and new ones arisen as three major blocs, the Allies, the Axis and the Sino-Soviet Union (SSU) fight the world over for VK, a valuable new resource that power their new fighting machines.

Dust Tactics is a miniatures board game for 2 or more players. The Axis Kampfgruppe Stefan starter set contains everything you need to start playing Dust Tactics, including 10 highly-detailed plastic miniatures, unit cards, terrain elements, special Dust dice, and the Dust rulebook. Enter the world of Dust and lead your Axis Kampfgruppe into battle against Allied or SSU Battlegroups.

Note: The rules and cards in this box are based on the version 2 rules, but are slightly different from and not completely compatible with the full Dust Tactics version 2 rulebook.
160960.name: Dust Tactics: Axis Kampfgruppe Stefan Starter Set

160961.description:
The year is 1947. The war that started a decade ago has now spread worldwide. The discovery of a crashed alien spacecraft in the Antarctic has led to the development of revolutionary combat walkers that surpass the most advanced tank technology. Old alliances have fragmented and new ones arisen as three major blocs, the Allies, the Axis and the Sino-Soviet Union (SSU) fight the world over for VK, a valuable new resource that power their new fighting machines.

Dust Tactics is a miniatures board game for 2 or more players. The Allied Taskforce Joe starter set contains everything you need to start playing Dust Tactics, including 10 highly-detailed plastic miniatures, unit cards, terrain elements, special Dust dice, and the Dust rulebook. Enter the world of Dust and lead your Allied Taskforce into battle against Axis or SSU Battlegroups.

Note: The rules and cards in this box are based on the version 2 rules, but are slightly different from and not completely compatible with the full Dust Tactics version 2 rulebook.
160961.name: Dust Tactics: Allied Taskforce Joe Starter Set

160962.description:
The year is 1947. The war that started a decade ago has now spread worldwide. The discovery of a crashed alien spacecraft in the Antarctic has led to the development of revolutionary combat walkers that surpass the most advanced tank technology. Old alliances have fragmented and new ones arisen as three major blocs, the Allies, the Axis and the Sino-Soviet Union (SSU) fight the world over for VK, a valuable new resource that power their new fighting machines.

Dust Tactics is a miniatures board game for 2 or more players. The SSU Battlegroup Koshka starter set contains everything you need to start playing Dust Tactics, including 10 highly-detailed plastic miniatures, unit cards, terrain elements, special Dust dice, and the Dust rulebook. Enter the world of Dust and lead your SSU Battlegroup into battle against Axis or Allied Battlegroups.

Note: The rules and cards in this box are based on the version 2 rules, but are slightly different from and not completely compatible with the full Dust Tactics version 2 rulebook.
160962.name: Dust Tactics: SSU Battlegroup Koshka Starter Set

160963.description:
This game consist of ten different game variants to learn numbers and some basic math. The main components are foam numbers from 0 to 9. There are two pieces of every number and plus, minus and equality signs. Basic idea is to recognize numbers by feeling them in your hand. To prevent you from seeing the numbers, you construct bigger box from the game box and two cardboard walls. Those walls have an hole to put your hand into the box. Hole is covered with cloth.

Basic idea of the games is to find the wanted number(s) from the box. Some examples: 1. You have to pick up numbers in ascending order. 2. You throw 12 sided die and you have to find two numbers that add up to the result. 3. You pick up a tile with a two digit number and find corresponding numbers. And so on. In most advanced games you have to add or subtract numbers or you have to recognize number sequence.

160964.description:
Claim victory in the Galactic Civil War in Star Wars: Empire vs. Rebellion, a fast-paced card game for two players. In every game, you and your opponent match wits and resources over key events. If you can thwart your opponent, you claim the event, bringing you closer to victory. Whether you seek to triumph through military might, or use diplomacy to achieve your ends, the fate of the galaxy rests in your hands.

On one side of this galactic battleground are the heroes of the Rebel Alliance. Only rarely can these heroes go toe to toe with the unlimited reserves of the Imperial Navy and Army. Instead, the iconic characters of Star Wars and the unsung heroes of the Rebellion must work in secret, utilizing diplomacy, reconnaissance, and the Force to achieve their aims. Even when the Rebellion deploys its full military strength to win a battle or destroy a key Imperial emplacement, they need the groundwork put in place by Alliance Special Forces.

Opposing the heroic endeavors of the Rebel Alliance is the massive power of the Empire, led by the twisted Emperor. The dark side of the Force is strong with the Emperor and Darth Vader, and the military might of the Empire is unparalleled across the galaxy. Whether you undertake aggressive negotiations or hire bounty hunters and scum to ferret out Rebel spies, making the Empire the ultimate power in the galaxy rests in your hands.

To successfully win these struggles and reclaim the galaxy in Star Wars: Empire vs. Rebellion, you will need to utilize all of your resources. Every turn, you can increase your faction’s presence at the current event by drawing the top card from your deck and putting it into play. Each resource card you play give you more power and brings you closer to the objective value of the current event. As an example, the resource card shown to the right has a resource value of five, which it contributes to your total resource value while in play. Playing more resource cards may bring you closer to your target, but it also makes your efforts more obvious. If your total resource value ever passes the event’s objective value, your forces are discovered and your opponent claims the event.

Instead of playing a new resource card, you can also trigger the power of a resource card currently in play, exercising the might of the Empire or the cunning of the Rebel Alliance. To activate a resource card’s power, you must exhaust it by rotating it 90 degrees clockwise. Once a card is exhausted, you can't use its power unless it becomes ready again. In addition, an exhausted card contributes its exhausted resource value, shown in the lower left-hand corner of the card while the resource is ready.
160964.name: Star Wars: Empire vs. Rebellion

160965.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Stibbe, a company in the Netherlands.
160965.name: Monopoly: Stibbe

160966.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Schiphol, Amsterdam airport in the Netherlands.
160966.name: Monopoly: Schiphol

160967.name: HyperScan
160967.description:
HyperScan is a video game console from Mattel. It uses Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) technology along with traditional video game technology. It was marketed toward boys between the ages of five and nine who were not ready for high-end video games in terms of maturity or expense, though ironically the included game was rated T by the ESRB. The console used UDF format CD-ROMs. The HyperScan has two controller ports, as well as a 13.56 MHz RFID scanner that reads and writes to the "cards" which, in turn, activate features in and save data from the game. Players are able to enhance the abilities of their characters by scanning cards. Games retailed for $19.99 and the console itself for $69.99 at launch, but at the end of its very short lifespan, prices of the system were down to $9.99, the games $1.99, and booster packs $0.99.

The system was sold in two varieties, a cube, and a 2-player value pack. The cube box version was the version sold in stores. It included the system, controller, an X-Men game disc, and 6 X-Men cards. Two player value packs were sold online (but may have been liquidated in stores) and included an extra controller and 12 additional X-Men cards.

The system was discontinued in 2007, shortly after its release, and is featured as one of the ten worst systems ever by PC World magazine.

Source: Wikipedia, "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HyperScan,"; available under the CC-BY-SA License.

160968.description:
Homeland: The Game is a semi-cooperative game of intrigue, deception and hidden agendas. Players assume the roles of CIA analysts, directing agency resources to combat the rising tide of global terrorism. Be warned, not everyone is what they seem.


Stay Alert: New threats are constant. Every card played matters. Any action could be the difference between stability and catastrophe.



Be Vigilant: Use every tool at your disposal to stop impending terrorist threats. Deploy soldiers, insert agents and recruit key assets to neutralize imminent dangers and keep the nation safe.



Trust No One: Not everyone is what they seem. Watch your rival's actions carefully to try to decipher if they are working against you!


Homeland: The Game draws 3 to 6 players into its web of espionage and paranoia. As the pressure mounts, will your actions tip the balance towards national security or global chaos?
160968.name: Homeland: The Game

160969.name: Crosscountry USA
160969.description:
Developed for the PC, the purpose of the game is to pick up commodities from one city and deliver them to another by driving across the country. Players interacted with the game through a command line using commands such as "turn on truck". This game was the American counterpart to Cross Country Canada and Crosscountry Canada 2

Source: Wikipedia, "Cross Country USA", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

160970.description:
This set adds nine new cards to the Star Realms deckbuilding game. The set includes:

Smuggling Run
Frontier Fleet
Bold Raid
Energy Shield x2
Merc Cruiser (Unaligned Ship)
Unlikely Alliance
Nemesis Beast - Solo Challenge
Nemesis Beast - Coop Challenge
160970.name: Star Realms: Promo Set Two

160971.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Curaçao, a tropical Dutch island in the Carribean.
160971.name: Monopoly: Curaçao

160972.description:

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from RSC Anderlecht, a Belgian soccer team.

160974.name: Boreml 1831
160974.description:
A game about the battle of Boreml (April 19th, 1831) which was biggest cavalry battle during the Russo-Polish War (November Uprising).

Game was published in 33 issue of "Taktyka i strategia" magazine. It uses "Napoleon" system rules.

160977.name: Monopoly: Moshi Monsters

160978.name: Air Race
160978.description:
The entire rules:

Each player chooses a particular coloured Aeroplane.

No player can start until he has thrown a 6 with the dice, this counting as his first move.

The game proceeds by moving the Aeroplanes according to the number shown by the throw of the dice.

The player must observe all the hazards his Aeroplane alights upon, whether in his favour or otherwise.

The exact number required to reach the 100 must be thrown and the first player to do so is the winner.

The board comprises a track of 100 spaces spiraling around a painting of a Gloster Gladiator with RAF roundels. There can have been little playtesting: a player can never land upon the 3 space but it bears the penalty "Fail to rise: miss one throw".

The Gloster Meteor depicted was notable from 1944 to 1955.

160979.name: Breach & Clear
160979.description:
The world of Special Operations is a tight knit, closed group populated by incredibly knowledgeable and motivated individuals who answer to a life of service. Breach & Clear allows you to take a peek at the world of Special Operations as well as close quarters battles in this highly engaging and detail-oriented tactical strategy title.

Working with members of this elite community and suppliers to the best of the best, gamers will be able to customize and orient special operations teams from around the world as you take on missions that have been planned out by members of this highly selective community.


Build your team from the ground up like never before
Customize your loadout, your weapon and your team to create the most efficient force it can be
Guide your team with intuitive controls as you take on some of the most dangerous scenarios available with design input by real members of special operations
Take on hardened enemy positions and increasingly complex missions and levels
Unlock and equip the very best that the special operations community has to offer from real world rifles and equipment to units from around the US and abroad


Breach & Clear is the definition of customization and strategy as you take a glimpse of a world so closed off from the norm. We also offer custom in-game patches where 100% of the proceeds will go to help veterans and their families in need!

Source: The Game Website.

160980.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from IHC Merwede, a (maritime) dredging company.
160980.name: Monopoly: World Dredging Edition

160981.name: Riptide GP2
160981.description:
Riptide GP2 is the full-featured sequel to one of the most successful racing franchises on mobile.

Featuring rocket-powered hydro jets racing around futuristic tracks across a dynamic and interactive water surface, Riptide GP2 delivers a fast, fun, and visually stunning racing experience.
Features


Tons of original content. All new tracks, new hydro jets, new game modes, and more!
Online Multi-player! Race against your friends in pulse-pounding online matches (with Google Play game services on Android and GameCenter/iCloud on iOS)
VR Challenge mode. Race against recordings of your friends' best times in the new VR Challenge mode!
Deep new career mode. Level up your rider and learn new stunts, compete in dozens of events, earn cash to customize your hydro jet and rider, become a racing legend.
Upgrades and customization. Collect a garage full of hydro jets and customize their performance and paint schemes.
Cutting edge technology. Powered by the all-new Vector Engine 4, and optimized to take full advantage of the latest mobile technology, Riptide GP2 builds on the original game’s stunning visuals with extra-crisp HD graphics, complex shaders, dynamic lighting, and real-time shadows.


Source: The Publisher Website.

160982.name: Insane Traffic
160982.description:
Insane Traffic is a card and dice game that simulates the traffic situations in Metro Manila, Philippines. You are an everyday driver living in Metro Manila and the goal of the game is to get the most number of points by reaching check points in different areas of Metro Manila.

The game has a great balance of dice rolling for movement (to depict the randomness of traffic) and hand management to add chaos and skill to the game. Insane Traffic is also an educational game wherein players must be able to recognize the different traffic signs in the game to increase their chances of winning.

160983.description:
Trilemma is an abstract game, where players make simultaneous moves in order to create a pattern of stones in their color.

The players each secretly choose a numbered stone they wish to place on the board and then reveal simultaneously. Uncontested stones are placed in the desired spot. If players choices conflict, a non-conflicting player claims the spot according to a simple deterministic rule.

First player to create a line of three stones in his color, wins the round and thereby two poins. First player to 10 points wins the game.

Playing the game involves bluffing, smart choices and banter. It offers the feel of a 'dilemma for three', hence Trilemma!
160983.name: Trilemma

160984.name: Die Weiden des Windes
160984.description:
Publisher Blurb

Ein Bauernaufstand zwingt die Helden dazu, sich einer zwielichtigen Handelskarawane auf ihrem Weg in das Herz der Kalorischen Ebene anzuschließen. Schnell häufen sich seltsame Vorkommnisse. Wer sind die Händler wirklich? Was wollen die Verfolge? Und welche Geheimnisse mag der Targonenstamm der Quokai bergen?
Weiden des Windes führt die Helden in das erste Kaufabenteuer zu Elyrion – Erbe der Titanen und macht sie mit der Schönheit und den Gefahren der Kalorischen Ebene und ihrer wilden Bewohner vertraut.

translation by Google
A peasant uprising forces the heroes to join a shady merchant caravan on their way into the heart of the caloric level. Quick accumulate strange occurrences. Who are the dealers really? What do the Track? And what secrets like the Targonenstamm the Quokai involve?
Pastures of the wind leads the heroes in the first department adventure Elyrion - Heritage of the Titans and making them familiar with the beauty and the dangers of caloric level and their wild inhabitants.

160985.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Unit4, a software company in the Netherlands.
160985.name: Monopoly: Unit4

160986.description:
